name: Crown's Forge
description:
A game about managing a shop and crafting your own products. Buy mysterious materials and discover their properties, while experimenting in your forge. Create items to fulfill contracts or satisfy your everyday customers.

Current sate of development

Crown's Forge is a one person and zero budget endeavor, in a very early stage of development. Currently you will find many placeholders in the game,  no sound, and most of the current ingame art is intended to be replaced in the future.

In the current version, you start with only a portion of the content unlocked and unlock the rest upon reaching lvl 5. There are about 1-2 hours worth of content currently in the game.

How can you Help?

Simply share your thoughts, ideas and comments in the community section below. If you came across any bugs, you can also post them there.
